description: A vibrant herby tabbouleh is the perfect accompaniment to a warming tagine and is also great as part of a buffet for a barbecue.

default: 150g/5½oz bulgur wheat, soaked in cold water overnight
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Drain the bulgur wheat well, pressing down lightly to ensure all the water is removed. Put in a large bowl.
Add all the other ingredients and mix well. Season, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve.
title: Herby tabbouleh
